title: Transgender teacher speaks out against 'Naked Education' show featuring 14-year-olds: 'It's just wrong'
description: Transgender teacher and journalist Debbie Hayton denounced a British program exposing children to naked bodies in the name of calling out “heteronormative" education.

title: Biden admin roasted over new transgender Title IX regulations: 'Insane injustice'
description: Critics ripped the Biden administration following its unveiling of new proposals to Title IX rules expanding the meaning of sexual discrimination to include gender identity.

title: Gunmen kill at least 50 in attacks on village in Nigeria
description: Gunmen in north-central Nigeria killed at least 50 people in attacks on Wednesday. The assailants opened fire in a market in Umogidi village in Benue state.

title: Texas man killed bar owner after she refused to serve him drink: Authorities
description: A Texas man allegedly shot and killed a bar owner who refused to serve him a drink, authorities said.

title: Indiana man convicted of killing father, leaving body in storage unit
description: Jeremy Farmer, 38, of Indianapolis has been convicted of shooting his 58-year-old father, Roger, and leaving the body in a suburban storage unit for nearly 17 months.

title: Maine mom sues school district for helping teen transition without her consent
description: Amber Lavigne of Newcastle, Maine, is suing her school district for allegedly helping her daughter undergo a social gender transition without consulting her first.

title: Dolphins' Tyreek Hill announces plans to retire after contract ends, reveals post-NFL career plans
description: Tyreek Hill just completed his seventh season in the NFL and revealed this week he plans to retire after finishing his contract with the Miami Dolphins.

title: Caitlyn Jenner blasts 'woke' Nike for making transgender Dylan Mulvaney paid ambassador: 'This is an outrage'
description: Nike and Bud Light have received massive backlash since it was revealed that transgender social media influencer Dylan Mulvaney is a paid ambassador for both of them.

title: California school board votes to uphold so-called 'parental secrecy policy' for transgender students

description: The Gulf Center for Sea Turtle Research in Galveston, Texas, announced that sea turtle patrollers recently found an alligator near the shoreline of the Bolivar Peninsula.

title: Oklahoma's attorney general says Glossip's murder conviction should be vacated
description: Oklahoma's attorney general said Richard Glossip's murder conviction should be vacated. Glossip was convicted of hiring his co-defendant to kill his boss in 1997.

title: Gabby Petito's parents ask Brian Laundrie's parents about major withdrawals in new court filing

description: Some progressive Democrats have called for Supreme Court Justice Clarence Thomas to be impeached over reports he failed to disclose gifts from a Republican donor.
